public class Bullet extends Entity

    • canBulletHit

      public static boolean canBulletHit(Rectangle2D.Double targetHitbox, Rectangle2D.Double sourceHitbox, Rectangle2D.Double attackBox)
      Check if the bullet can hit the target
      Parameters:
      targetHitbox - the hitbox of the target
      sourceHitbox - the hitbox of the source
      attackBox - the attack box of the source
      Returns:
      true if the bullet can hit the target, false otherwise
